name: hotel_photos
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool priceline_com_provider.
Tool description: priceline.com | Lets you search hotels, cars for rent, flights. **Support**:  [tipsters@rapi.one](mailto:tipsters@rapi.one) / t.me/api_tipsters **Other travel  api:** https://rapi.one
API description: Fetches a list of photos for given hotels based on their IDs from the RapidAPI Priceline provider.

hotel_ids.description: Comma-separated string of PPN hotel IDs (Semi Opaque Only).

image_size.description: The size of the images to be returned. Valid options are 'small' (60px), 'medium' (300 to 312px), or 'large' (500 to 800px). Defaults to 'medium'.
